about_the_game:
Play as a young warrior Troy, who dies in battle, gets resurrected by the Underworld queen Lilith, and returns to the world of the living to gather a party of heroes to save the kingdom and the entire world from the forces of Eternal Evil. Fight enemies, follow quests, explore ancient catacombs and ruins, and romance your hot companions.



Explore the vast game world while following the main plot, and a variety of side-quests from different characters you'll meet on your way. Enjoy a variety of unique maps with carefully placed enemies, loot, and secrets.


Turn-based battles are an essential part of gameplay in Blood Raiders. Exterminate your enemies with a tactical approach. Careful planning of weapons and armor, skills, and party members is the key to success during brutal fights with rivals of all shapes and sizes.


Your journey is filled with diverse characters, each with a unique role to play in your adventures. Discover allies who offer quests and valuable rewards, enhancing your experience and propelling you toward greatness.


But be wary, for not everyone you encounter has noble intentions. Some may launch attacks on sight or lure you into traps. Stay vigilant!




Dive into hardcore sexual adventures and wild pleasures that await in the dark fantasy world of Blood Raiders. Observe and participate in explicit kinky scenes with naked sinners in the dark corridors of the Underworld, and then enjoy love and lust in the world of the living after the resurrection.


Build and explore relationships with your party members while indulging in spontaneous, passionate encounters with NPCs in towns, brothels, taverns, and various other locations.


Every decision leaves a mark on your relationships, shaping the course of your unique story. Find new seductive companions for your party, and enjoy hot girls for sex and romance.

Explore multiple dungeons and ruins, and fight hordes of enemies in bloody battles. And finally, save the kingdom and the whole world from Eternal Evil. Begin your epic journey!



Gameplay features:


  • story-rich plot;
  • high-quality 3D maps for exploration and questing;
  • explicit sex scenes and CGs;
  • party members with unique personalities, battle skills, and sexual preferences;
  • dozens of optional NPCs for sexual affairs;
  • multiple side quests;
  • turn-based battle system;
  • a variety of enemies and monsters;
  • collectibles and rare loot.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted in the game are over the age of 18.
The game contains content not appropriate for all ages: nudity, sexual acts, strong language, and mild violence.

detailed_description:

name: Blood Raiders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Play an isometric dark fantasy RPG. Make quests, explore dungeons, fight monsters, hunt for rare loot, enjoy sexual adventures, and gather seductive companions for your party of Blood Raiders to save the kingdom from the forces of Eternal Evil! 😈
